    • Method Detail

      • onBufferReceived

        protected final boolean onBufferReceived(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Specified by:
        onBufferReceived in class AbstractTcpReader
        Parameters:
        buffer - to be read from
        Returns:
        • true when there were enough bytes to perform the read operation
        • false otherwise. In this case, the buffer is reset, compacted, and filled with new content.
